title: Skin i got as gift has disappeared
body:
i had received 2 mystery gifts from my friend a two weeks ago and today i search them and it says me to unlock the skins with RP !! so i typed down a support ticket to Riot and the answer was 

**Marceline the Vampire Queen here!
Thanks for your feedback towards the bugs that you have noticed. If you haven't already, I recommend posting a description of what happened on our bug report forum:
NA- http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report
I can't provide a timeline for when we might see a fix on this issue, but thank you again for the report. Please let me know if you have any other questions!
Regarding your Haunted Zyra skin,and Rugged Garen skin this gifted content was purchased through a transaction that was reversed by the corresponding bank account. All gifts sent by this account have been removed from recipients. For the sake of privacy, I’m not able to disclose any details relating to the account that sent these gifts, and we can’t restore any content sent by the account.
Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
Marceline the Vampire Queen
Player Support Specialist
Riot Games**

so guys i want to know y this has happened and what do i do to get the skins back !! please help me !

replies.body: basically what happen was the owner of the card that was used to make the purchase called their bank and basically said that that transaction wasn't done on their behalf so the bank returns the customer their money making riot tak back the skin since there is no funds for that skin{{champion:103}}

Hiya! 

It looks like your situation falls into one of [these categories](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/gfX587IW-champsskins-i-was-gifted-are-gone-where-did-they-go). 

*2) If a player purchases RP and gifts content with it, and subsequently issues a chargeback for the money spent on that RP, we will remove that content.*

Since payment was ultimately not received, we removed the content from your account.

Just kind of thought of something with the lowered requirements for gifting system that's kind of a cheat?
- Get to required level on the gifter account
- Mystery Gift friend/self on other account
- If friend/self gets something 'good,' pay for it at reduced pricing.
- If friend/self gets something they don't want, refuse payment, not care if account gets locked/content removed.

- Always get skins at reduced/mystery gift pricing.
- Profit...kinda?

Unless you have fail-safes to prevent that.

..not gonna go test it out or anything, just thought of a loophole that maybe should be closed up?

HI would you look at my thread that i posted and talk to me about it i think it is very important and would like to talk to someone from riot about it and see how they feel and i feel like a lot of ppl feel the same that i do

If you look closely it say's that the recipent that bought it has it reversed, the transaction didn't go through.

Meaning your friend might have money problems

There isn't a way to get them back. By the sounds of it, there was an issue with the bank and RIOT had to take back the RP and whatever was bought with it. The only way to get them is for you to buy them. Luckily, they were gifted and not your money spent on them.
So you're missing more than these two skins?  Regarding your Haunted Zyra skin,and Rugged Garen
